channel.title: Serious Error, please help!
channel.description: I was editing stat bonuses for items in items.cfg. I think I did something wrong or something, but I edited 2 things. When I compiled, I got no errors. When I ran the server, when people logged in, they got stuck in the loading screen. I tried to fix like 10 times but it didnt work. When I run server, I get this. Please help! [code]- Hiyascape v2 - .. Online! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "0 0 0 0 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:347) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:28) [/code]

item.title: Serious Error, please help!
item.dc:creator: @tuptup13 tuptup13

dude omg i just got the same exact thingâ€¦ ima try and fix it.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 30, 2008, 07:21:35 PM[/size][hr]I fixed it.

dont use spaces
use tabs

thats mainly how you do it

item.title: Serious Error, please help!

I was editing stat bonuses for items in items.cfg. I think I did something wrong or something, but I edited 2 things. When I compiled, I got no errors.
